title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 50.1 - Application for approval of refunding
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 50.1 - Application for approval of refunding

State Regulations

The application for approval of refunding shall be made by
a person duly authorized so to do by resolution of the governing
board. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
50.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
